metadata.title: CVE-2019-14528 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
GnuCOBOL 2.2 has a heap-based buffer overflow in read_literal incobc/scanner.l via crafted COBOL source code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14528` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnucobol - 3.0~rc1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnucobol package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0~rc1-2').
